laboratory_examinations.findings: WBC 16.9 with left shift, K 3.2, Cr 1.8, lactate 1.2.
Negative for toxigenic C. difficile by the Illumigene DNA amplification assay. (Reference Range-Negative).

Liver echogenicity homogeneous, smooth contour, no focal liver mass, main portal vein patent, no ascites. Mild intrahepatic biliary dilation, CBD measures 1.2 mm. Gallbladder with no wall thickening, numerous gallstones up to 2 cm. Pancreas poorly visualized.
